connectorCategory.description: The idea of IDE 2.0 is built around leveraging crowdsourcing in your IDE to make your IDE the smartest place on earth. All tools in this category improve your IDE by either improving the quality of your code completion, quickfixes or enhance your API documentation.
connectorCategory.name: IDE 2.0 - Building Amazon for Software Engineers

connectorCategory.description: Incubation projects at Code Recommenders. Note that these incubators may not be production ready.
connectorCategory.name: Code Recommenders Incubation Projects

connectorDescriptor.description: Connect is powered by 39 million completion events collected from developers working on open source projects. Install it to leverage the power of crowdsourcing.
connectorDescriptor.name: Codetrails Connect, Community Ed.

overview.summary: Codetrails Connect also gives your the opportunity to have private repositories where you can share knowledge for your private APIs only with selected people.

connectorDescriptor.description: Install this feature to get access to dozens of code snippets showing how to use popular APIs like SWT and the Java standard library.
connectorDescriptor.name: Snipmatch - A crowdsourced snippet completion engine
